title: Ask Charlie Anything 124: Monetization of Medical Mutilation? Paul Ryan's Betrayal? And MORE
itunes:title: Ask Charlie Anything 124: Monetization of Medical Mutilation? Paul Ryan's Betrayal? And MORE
description:
Charlie takes the questions you email him at Freedom@CharlieKirk.com.

Including: What are the newest, cult-like incantations of the leftist medical establishment? How big of a business is the trans movement becoming? What should we do when medical schools become woke and pledge themselves to fighting not disease, but the gender binary and colonialism? What is the point of the modern military and what does Gen. Milly mean by "white rage?" Should normal, freedom loving Americans join the ranks of the enlisted men and women? Why has Paul Ryan spoken out against Donald Trump and what does it say about the future of MAGA? 

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
